Text:
No split tracks, so I deleted the torrent again. 
Thanks anyway for the upload ...

Yes, the EAC rippers often don't bother to split the tracks. Apparently it isn't automatic, like in other ripping software. But it is easy to do with any of the numerous music format converters out there. I use http://poikosoft.com.

Also if this is such a big deal for you, after it starts downloading check the file list in the torrent. Then delete it before wasting your bandwidth.
